title: Senior Backend Engineer
summary: Highly accomplished Senior Backend Engineer with 8+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable and resilient microservices. Proficient in Python, Go, and cloud platforms (AWS), with a strong track record of optimizing performance, leading technical projects, and mentoring junior engineers. Passionate about building robust systems that drive business growth.

description: Led the design and implementation of a new real-time data processing pipeline using Kafka, Python, and AWS Lambda, improving data ingestion speed by 40%.
Architected and developed scalable microservices in Go, handling millions of requests per day with <100ms latency.
Mentored a team of 3 junior engineers, fostering best practices in code quality, testing, and deployment.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitLab CI, reducing deployment time by 30% and improving release reliability.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs for core services using Python (Django/Flask), serving over 500,000 daily active users.
Optimized database queries and schemas (PostgreSQL) leading to a 25% performance improvement for critical application features.
Collaborated with front-end teams to integrate new features and ensure seamless user experience.
Participated in on-call rotation to support production systems and resolve incidents promptly.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
